verbose_text: Activated AKT relays its survival signals in a number of ways including phosphorylation and inactivation of the pro apoptotic BH3 protein BAD, members of the Forkhead family of transcription factors and Mdm2, the negative regulator of p53.
evidence: Activated AKT relays its survival signals in a number of ways including phosphorylation and inactivation of the pro-apoptotic BH3 protein BAD
